lines.text: All the dead are dead - and the living are dying.
So where are we heading for?
It's the only place we ever got a signal from. Albany is the place to aim for.
Sort of the objective of the operation, right?
You could call it that. See, there's a way across... well, not really a way across, but the screens show it to be the path of least resistance. It's not good, but it's the best we've got.
What happens if we make a wrong turn?
There are areas of radiation we couldn't get through. It's not a matter of wrong turns though - "Damnation Alley" is a hundred miles wide a lot of the way.

[looking at a large satellite image screen]
Looks like a satellite re-entry to me.

[after checking data on computer]
Negative on satellite...

[Soviet ICBM missile launch indications appear on a large computer screen, alarm sounds]
Blue Square One, Blue Square One, Blue Square One. Alpha, Tango, Foxtrot, Sierra, Delta. Two. Omega, Zebra, Six, One. Authentication Sierra Alpha.

[the Landmaster refugees are being waylaid by the "Mountain Men" in the desert]
How long have you men been here?
Don't go making something personal out of this. Perry is dead. That doesn't make you right and me wrong. It just means Perry is dead.
